column1: copy your Kobo tool "questions" sheet to the corresponding sheet here
1. copy your data to the data sheet
see the "input check" to insure your inputs match
2. define your composite indicators in the composite indicators" sheet
3. save this file, then click "update input" on the left. It will look a bit weird but works.
4. open analysis_definition.xlm and follow the instructions.
4. now open "run.R" in Rstudio, mark all lines and press ctrl+ENTER
